titleStmt.title: A description of the nature of four-footed beasts with their figures en[graven in brass] / written in Latin by Dr. John Johnston ; translated into English by J.P.
Historiae naturalis de quadrupetibus. English
titleStmt.author: Jonstonus, Joannes, 1603-1675.
J. P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the widow of John Jacobsen Schipper, and Stephen Swart,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Historiae naturalis de quadrupetibus [sic], which forms part of his work on animals.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
Imperfect: some letters missing on t.p.

person.persName: the widow of John Jacobsen Schipper
